name: ⚡ Design System Documentation Kit
description:
A plug & play kit for documenting design systems

Great design systems will evangelize themselves through beautiful and concise documentation – give your docs a jump-start with these plug & play components.


This free kit includes:

– A range of responsive & auto-layout documentation components

– Guide & examples of kit usage


Also includes a scalable & customizable design system, integrating with:

– Tailwind CSS color system

– Ionicons icon library
